name: Perlegear Advanced Tilt TV Wall Mount, Pre-Assembled Tv Mount for Most 42-90 inch TVs up to 150 lbs, 6-inch Arm Extension, 15° Full Tilt, Fits 24″/16″ Wood Studs, Max VESA 600x400mm
short_description: Large TV Compatibility: This tilt TV wall mount is compatible with most 42″ to 90″ TVs with VESA patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase. The wall mount TV bracket can support 150 lbs, 30% more weight than other similar mounts.

15° Full Tilt: Enjoy TV full tool-free tilt with our 65, 70, 72, 75, 77, 78, 80, 82, 85, 86, 90 inch wall TV mount when the wall mount arms are extended. Simply loosen the tilt knobs, adjust tilt, then retighten the knobs to secure it. The pull cord locking mechanisms can be used to lock or release the TV and arms from the wall plate without the need for tools.

6″ Arm Extension: The unique articulating arms of this advanced tilt TV mount allow you to extend your screen for easier access to connections on the back and swivel ±8° for optimal cable access. When retracted, the TV bracket sits 2.91″ from the wall for a low-profile look, with an open wall plate that provides space behind the TV for a wall outlet.

Quick & Easy Installation: The 75 inch tv wall mount includes a drilling template and hardware to mount on wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls. The preassembled wall plate makes installation easier with less assembly required. The tv mount 75 inch is not designed to mount on drywall alone, which will void the limited 5-year warranty.

Easily Center Your TV: The fireplace tv mount has a wide 30.91″ x 9.45″ wall plate designed to fit 16″–24″ wood studs, making it easier to install the 85 inch tv wall mount where you need it. TVs with VESA patterns up to 500mm wide can be shifted left or right on the wall plate for perfect screen centering.

name: Amazon Basics Full Motion Articulating TV Monitor Wall Mount for 26" to 55" TVs and Flat Panels up to 80 Lbs, Black
short_description: Important: Watch the video and learn the”Designed for" details listed below!

Designed for VESA sized from 100x100 MM through 400x400 MM.
Comfortable View with tilt range from +10° to -5°.
Articulating up range from 2.6" to 16.3" ; 180° swivel.
Mounting hardware, bubble level, mounting template and User manual included.

name: EconoMe TV Wall Mount for Most 32-70 inch Flat Screen/LED/4K TVs, TV Mount with Swivel and Tilt Articulating Dual Arms, Full Motion Wall Mount up to 16” Stud, Max VESA 400X400mm, up to 99lbs
short_description: TV wall mount for an elevated viewing experience. This wall mount fits for most 32-70 inch TVs with VESA patterns from 100x100mm to 400x400mm, which loads up to 99 LBS. Please check the wall type, TV weight, VESA pattern, and reference TV size before purchasing this TV bracket. DO NOT install into drywall alone.

Do you want the flexibility to move your TV around? Tilt up 5°/ down 10°, level +/- 3°, swivel +/-45°. Finding the right articulating TV wall mount, TV can be adaptable to a changing space for optimizing your viewing experience. Fits for Living space, Kitchen, School, Gym, Café, Hotel, Diner and so on.

Fit your TV into your room designs! Sunny rooms might benefit from a tilting adjustment to reduce glare. Articulating(Swivel and Extend) TV wall mount is a better option for living space with multiple viewing zones. Whether you have a smaller secondary screen for your bedroom or a big-screen main TV in your living room.

The most straightforward, simple installation. The simpler, the better. You deserve clean and clear instruction. Come with an additional paper mounting template and level tool for ease of installation. Concrete anchor size is Ф10×61mm which will be sent per request.

Friendly Customer Service. 1. Not sure if it's suitable for your TV? 2. Concerned with the installation? 3. Need other hardware (screws, spacers, washers, etc.)? 4. Need other help? - Welcome to ask our team any issue.
Adds convenience and style to your living space. Fits Living room, Bedroom, Kitchen, School, Gym, Café, Hotel, Diner and so on.

name: ECHOGEAR No Stud TV Mount for Drywall - Slim No Drill Design Holds TVs Up to 100lbs with Nails - Easy Studless Install with No Drill Needed
short_description: No drilling. No, really: This mount installs directly to drywall - no studs necessary. 32 tiny-but-mighty nails work as a team to hold up to 100 pounds safely for TVs up to 77".
With your TV sitting only 1.18" from the wall, this mount's super slim, low profile design makes it all but invisible. Plus, the bottom of the screen rests against the wall for glare-killing tilt.
Don't need the screen tilt? We included magnetic standoffs to prop up the TV for a flush finish. Bonus: It'll also give you additional room to access cables & prevent wall scratches.
Get it straight: Built-in bubble level means you'll get your installation jussssst right the first time. After you're done, lock it in place with the oddly satisfying safety button.

Thanks to its universal design, this mount fits so many TVs, we might as well call it "Mr. Worldwide." Turns out, that nickname's taken, so we'll call it "Mr. Mount Compatible with VESA patterns 75mm - 625mm" instead.

If you searched for one of these words, you're in the right place: low profile tv wall mount, no stud tv mount, drywall tv mount, wall mount tv bracket, 65 inch tv wall mount, tv mounts for flatscreens, television wall mount, fireplace tv mount, 75 inch tv wall mount, tilt tv mount, echogear tv mount, universal, slim

name: FORGING MOUNT Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount for 42-110" TVs up to 220lbs with 8.2" Sliding Moving for Screen Centering, Full Motion TV Mount Fit 24"-16" Studs with Swivel,Tilt&Level, Max VESA 800x600mm
short_description: Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount: Crafted from heavy-gauge steel, the 100 inch TV wall mount is designed for large TVs up to 220lbs and display sized 42-110 inch. Durable and Reliable: This Swivel TV Mount is build with heavy duty carbon steel construction, wider wallplate and bigger size arms to support TVs up to 220 lbs, and it is passed 3 times (660Lbs) loading test.

Horizontal Shift for TV Centering - Sliding TV Mount for Centered Control: 8.2" sliding design allows TVs to shift horizontally left or right 8.2" for perfect TV placement. The sliding TV wall mount is convenient to center your TV on the wall plate.

Wide Compatibility Universal TV Mount: This wall mount TV bracket is designed to fit most 42″-110″ flat or curved TVs with VESA patterns 200x100 to 800x600mm. The 86 inch TV wall mount can be installed on 24″/16″/18″ wood studs or solid concrete walls, and brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

Excellent viewing experience Full Motion TV Mount: The 86 inch TV wall mount can be tilted +12°/-5°and swivesled +/-75°for comfortable viewing angle. Designed with Dual articulation arms, your TV can be extended up 26" and retracted back to 3.2", which save some valuable space for you.

Easy to Install: Fast installation with a preassembled front bracket. All hardware is included in pre-labeled bags. Horizontal post installation leveling +/-3° for easier and quicker adjustment. Cable ties tidy TV cables up, making your house look neat.
product_description: Full Motion Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount for 42-110" TVs - Full Motion Has Smooth Swivel, Tilt, & Extension - Universal Design Works with Samsung, Vizio & More - Includes Hardware & Heavy Duty TV Wall Bracket, specifically designed for large televisions ranging from 75 inches to 110 inches. Made of upgraded steel, this TV wall mount can hold up to 220 lbs and is compatible with VESA holes from 200*100 to 800*600, fitting most brands of TVs including Samsung, LG, Sony, TCL, Hisense, and Vizio.Experience excellent viewing angles with our swivel TV mount, which can be rotated +/-90° left and right and tilted at an angle of 12°/-5°. Once installed, the TV sits just 2.4 inches from the wall, but can be extended up to 26 inches with the Dual Articulating Arms for the perfect viewing position.Installation is made easy with the preassembled front support, saving you 30% of installation time. The TV wall bracket also features horizontal adjustment of +/-3° and includes a leveling device to ensure your TV is perfectly straight.Mount your TV on 12”, 16”, 18”, or 24” wood studs, concrete walls, or brick walls with the included hardware. Note that this 100 inch TV wall mount is not suitable for drywall installation alone, and if you require concrete anchors, simply contact us for assistance. any installation questions or product selection. Trust in FORGING MOUNT to make your 86 inch TV wall bracket installation smooth and hassle-free.

name: Mounting Dream TV Wall Mount for 32-65 Inch Television,Mount with Swivel and Tilt, Full Motion Bracket with Articulating Dual Arms, Fits 16inch Studs, Max VESA 400X400 mm, 99lbs, MD2380
short_description: Universal TV Mount: TV wall mount fits most 32-65" TVs up to 99 LBS, with max VESA of 400mm x 400mm/16" x 16" mounting holes spacing. If your wood stud spacing exceeds 16 inches, please refer to the 16", 18", 24" wood stud full motion TV mount MD2380-24K

Enhance Viewing Experience: This full motion TV mount tilts TV up 5° and down 15° to reduce glare, and swivels TV left or right according to your seat position. Pull out to 17.5" and retract back to 3.4", making your TV alive to move

Easy Installation: TV wall mounts with clear instruction and hardware in pre-labeled bags. +/-3° post-installation adjustment allows TV leveling after installation. The paper template makes the installation of TV mounting bracket easier. Considerate Design for Allen Key Storage
Heavy-duty Unit: TV wall mount swivel and tilt designed with 6 articulating arms. The technology of robot welding makes this wall mount TV bracket sturdy and safe

US-based Customer Support: We are glad to answer your pre-purchase and installation questions about TV mounts. Mounting Dream TV wall mounts are NOT FOR DRYWALL INSTALLATION. (Concrete Anchors available on request. Anchors Specifications:φ10x50mm)

name: PERLESMITH Tilting TV Wall Mount Bracket Low Profile for Most 23-60 inch LED LCD OLED, Plasma Flat Screen TVs with VESA 400x400mm Weight up to 115lbs, Fits 16" Wood Stud
short_description: UNIVERSAL DESIGN: Tilted TV wall mount for 23" - 60" TVs weight up to 115lbs / 52 kg. Our TV tilt mount has a compatible faceplate that fits VESA 75X75mm (3"x3") 100X75mm (4”x3”) 100X100mm (4"x4") 200X100mm (8"x4") 200X200mm (8"x8") 300X200mm (12”x8”) 300X300mm (12"x12") 400X300mm (16"x12") 400X400mm (16"x16"). Please check VESA (Mounting hole pattern on the back of TV), TV weight, wall stud location and possible blocked cable/input

SAFE TO USE: High quality steel construction ensures safety. This wall mount TV bracket has high standards. It has been tested to hold 4 times the weight they're rated to based on UL standard so you can rest assured that it will hold the weight of your TV. It also comes with a locking mechanism with quick release which easily secures your TV to the wall

EASY INSTALLATION: Hang your television like a pro! Easy to install on 16 inch wood studs with standard hardware. Get rid of the irritating glare from your screen and conveniently tilt your TV up to 7 degrees forwards or backwards as well as the ability to shift your baby laterally for perfect centering on your wall (Maximum tilt angle depends on TV size and the distance from the wall )

SAVE SPACE: Keep your TV close to the wall to save space. Our low profile tilting mount holds the back of the TV just 1. 2" away from the wall for a sleek and tidy appearance. Bubble Level. Panel Type-Detachable Panel
PRODUCT INCLUDES: Standard mounting hardware and our friendly customer service. We provide what you need to make installation as easy and convenient as possible!

name: Mounting Dream UL Listed TV Mount for Most 37-75 Inch TV, Universal Tilt TV Wall Mount Fit 16", 18", 24" Stud with Loading Capacity 132lbs, Max Vesa 600 x 400mm, Low Profile Flat Wall Mount Bracket
short_description: [TV Wall Mount and Suitability] The Mounting Dream TV wall mount is suitable for TV of 37-75 inches holding a weight of 132lbs with MAX VESA 600 x 400mm supporting 24 inches wood stud spacing. For better feel, you can check the weight of TV, VESA, wood studs spacing and blocked input. Kindly note that TV is just for reference. Patent no. 29/639, 502
[Space Saving] Due to the low-profile TV bracket being 1.5 inches closer to the wall than the standard TV bracket, this wall mount provides an ideal space-saving option with an attractive appearance.
[Tilt TV to Reduce Glare] You can tilt your TV forward up to 8 degrees with the Mounting Dream wall mount, which lessens glare and improves viewing.

[Easy to Install] With clear instructions and level, the wall mount is simple to install in just 3 steps. Please be aware that not all of our TV mounts are only suitable for drywall. Additional concrete anchors in the size of 10x50mm may be needed that are available through Mounting Dream team. If you prefer a single-piece wall mount, please refer MD2268-XL.
[Customer Service] To improve your experience and resolve your queries, we have active US based customer services every day of the week to ensure your problems are taken care of.

name: monTEK Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount for 37-90 inch TV up to 165lbs, 4X Load Tested, Full Motion with Dual Articulating Arms, Tool-Free Tilt, Swivel & Extend, VESA 200x100 to 600x400, Fits 12“/16" Studs
short_description: 【ULTRA STRONG & 4X LOAD-TESTED】Built for serious strength, the monTEK TV wall mount securely holds 37–90 inch flat and curved TVs weighing up to 165lbs. Featuring 40% reinforced dual arms and 4X load testing, it ensures unmatched stability. Whether you're upgrading your living room, building an immersive home theater, setting up a gaming zone, or enhancing a conference room, this tv mount delivers professional-grade performance in any space

【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】 Our full motion TV wall mount supports VESA patterns from 200x100mm to 600x400mm, compatible with major brands like Samsung, LG, Sony, TCL, Hisense, and more. Mount securely on 16" wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls. (Note: Not for drywall installation alone.). Perfect for those upgrading to a 55 inch, 65 inch, 70 inch, 75 inch or even 85 inch TV, this swivel TV wall mount brings compatibility, safety, and peace of mind to your home or office setup

【ULTIMATE FLEXIBILITY & VIEWING COMFORT】 Enjoy a comfortable, glare-free viewing experience with tool-free tilt (+5° to -15°) and a 60° swivel range. Featuring a quick-tilt knob, our full motion tv mount lets you adjust the screen angle in seconds—faster and easier than traditional TV mounts. Fine-tune the level of your screen by ±3° for perfect alignment. Perfect for movie nights, game marathons, or video conferences, this adjustable TV mount helps you get the best seat in the house, every time

【SPACE-SAVING & CABLE-READY】 The dual articulating arms allow you to extend your TV up to 16.6" from the wall, providing an immersive viewing experience. When not in use, the mount retracts to just 2.75", ensuring a sleek, low-profile design that saves space while maintaining style. Our wall mount tv bracket includes Velcro cable management straps to keep cords neat and and no more messy wires ruining your TV

【EASY INSTALLATION WITH SUPPORT】 Installation is a breeze with pre-labeled hardware, a bubble level, and clear instructions, so you can have your TV mounted in under 30 minutes. Plus, our friendly customer support team is always ready to assist with any questions you may have. Reliable after-sales service means your satisfaction is our priority

name: IWORKBORAD 55 65 75 85 inch Low Profile TV Wall Mount for 32-90 '' TVs, Tilt TV Mount Bracket, Safe Lock & Quick Release, Max VESA 600x400mm, 24 inch Studs,132 lbs, Fit Most 55+ 75+ 85+ 86 TVs
short_description: [Sturdy and Safe] You can relax knowing your TV is securely mounted to the wall with this UL-certified TV wall mount, which holds up to 132 lbs without a hitch. Its solid design keeps your TV steady, no wobbling or slipping here! Plus, we’ve got you covered with 10 years of support for this product.

[Securely Supports TVs Up To 90 Inches] The VESA compatibility of up to 600x400mm ensures a seamless fit with most standard mounting patterns. Designed for 24-inch studs, it offers enhanced flexibility in installation options. This versatility makes it ideal for accommodating various room layouts and TV configurations.

[Low Profile Design] This design allows your TV to be positioned close to the wall, optimizing space while creating a sleek and modern aesthetic. Despite its slim profile, the mount features a quick release mechanism that facilitates effortless adjustments and connections.
[Tilt TV to Reduce Glare] The wall mount enables you to tilt your TV forward by up to 9 degrees, effectively reducing glare and enhancing viewing quality.

[Easy Installation] The package includes all necessary hardware along with clear instructions. A paper template for marking drill holes would have been beneficial. Tips: Do not attempt installation into drywall alone; if concrete anchors are required, please contact us.
